subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Defender Keeley Dowling took a pass from Yael Averbuch and beat goalkeeper Hope Solo with a bending shot to the near post in the 30th minute as visiting Sky Blue F.C. defeated St. Louis Athletica, 1-0, Wednesday night in Fenton, Mo., to advance to the inaugural championship game of Women’s Professional Soccer.
